wikipedia_page.main: James McGovern (born 17 November 1956) is a Scottish Labour politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Dundee West from 2005 to 2015.

response: Ross was elected Member of Parliament for Dundee West in the May 1979 general election, succeeding Peter Doig.  He supported Tony Benn in the 1981 Labour Party deputy leadership election.  Ross was re-elected five times until his retirement at the 2005 general election, when he was succeeded by Jim McGovern.

* Jim McGovern (golfer) (born 1965), American PGA Tour player
* Jim McGovern (British politician) (born 1956), Member of the United Kingdom Parliament, 2005–2015
